languages.text: "Кого же?" {n}Хормейстер улыбается учтиво, но, кажется, чуточку саркастично.{/n}
"And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кого же?" {n}Хормейстер улыбается учтиво, но, кажется, чуточку саркастично.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

"And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Y de quién se trata?». {n}La sonrisa del maestro del Coro, aunque cordial, resulta ligeramente sarcástica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y de quién se trata?». {n}La sonrisa del maestro del Coro, aunque cordial, resulta ligeramente sarcástica.{/n}

languages.text: 「それは誰のことだい？」{n}クワイアーマスターは丁寧ではあるが、少し皮肉っぽい笑顔を見せる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それは誰のことだい？」{n}クワイアーマスターは丁寧ではあるが、少し皮肉っぽい笑顔を見せる。{/n}

languages.text: “这个人是谁呢？”{n}尽管唱诗大师彬彬有礼地微笑着，但笑容中却带着讽刺之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个人是谁呢？”{n}尽管唱诗大师彬彬有礼地微笑着，但笑容中却带着讽刺之意。{/n}

languages.text: "Und wer ist es?" {n}Das Lächeln des Chormeisters ist zwar höflich, wirkt aber doch ein klein wenig sarkastisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und wer ist es?" {n}Das Lächeln des Chormeisters ist zwar höflich, wirkt aber doch ein klein wenig sarkastisch.{/n}

languages.text: « Et qui donc, je vous prie ? » {n}Bien qu'empreint de courtoisie, le sourire du maître de chœur trahit également une pointe de sarcasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et qui donc, je vous prie ? » {n}Bien qu'empreint de courtoisie, le sourire du maître de chœur trahit également une pointe de sarcasme.{/n}

languages.text: "Peki kim olacak?" {n}Koro Şefi'nin gülümsemesi, her ne kadar nazik olsa da içinde belli belirsiz bir alay seziliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And who is it?" {n}The Choirmaster's smile, though courteous, seems ever so slightly sarcastic.{/n}
